name: Flesh Guardian
damage_immunities: lightning, poison; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hurl Object
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt (1/Day, While Bloodied)
actions.desc: An 80-foot-long  5-foot-wide lightning bolt springs from the guardians chest. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Berserk
special_abilities.desc: When the guardian starts its turn while bloodied, roll a d6. On a 6, the guardian goes berserk. While berserk, the guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If it can't reach a creature, it attacks an object. The guardian stays berserk until it is destroyed or restored to full hit points.

special_abilities.name: If a berserk guardian can see and hear its creator, the creator can use an action to try to calm it by making a DC 15 Persuasion check
special_abilities.desc: On a success, the guardian is no longer berserk.

special_abilities.name: Fire Fear
special_abilities.desc: When the guardian takes fire damage, it is rattled until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Lightning Absorption
special_abilities.desc: When the guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Constructed Nature
special_abilities.desc: Guardians dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.
